Tome of High Power

miscellaneous (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 364
magic bonus [boosters]: +AS

fire ritual range bonus [firerange]: +2
air ritual range bonus [airrange]: +2
water ritual range bonus [waterrange]: +2

Requires 10A10S to forge (A2S2)

This ancient book is infused with the power of the Sky and enhances the use of Air and Astral magic. It can also be used to greatly extend the range of magic rituals.
